com.github.alinaioanaflorea.xmldiff.ui.swing

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.alinaioanaflorea.xmldiff.ui.swing.GUI

  • public class GUI
extends Object
    This class builds and manages the XmlDiff's Swing GUI

      • setFocusOnButton

        public void setFocusOnButton(int buttonIndex)
        Sets focus on the button with the given index.
        If the index if out of the range then the focus will se set on the first button in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        buttonIndex - The index of the button to be set focus on
